Backed up files Databases Web sites to optical disk drives for instant recovery in case of problems Performed Web Application security testing on all new products Identified problems uncovered by ordering system from a dot matrix printer to a digital format scanned screen scraping the data and imported into a database thus reducing headcount and errors I was part of the oncall support staff
